verses.name: Ephesians 3:6
verses.text: That the Gentiles should be fellowheirs, and of the same body, and partakers of his promise in Christ by the gospel:

verses.name: Ephesians 3:7
verses.text: Whereof I was made a minister, according to the gift of the grace of God given unto me by the effectual working of his power.

verses.name: Ephesians 3:8
verses.text: Unto me, who am less than the least of all saints, is this grace given, that I should preach among the Gentiles the unsearchable riches of Christ;
